attributes.action: consider an Honour for Peter Patrick Lorimer for services to Association Football.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Made his debut for Leeds United when he was still 15 years of age, played until just before his 40th birthday! Scored a record 238 goals from 676 appearances for the club.

1963-1986 Leeds United, Toronto Blizzard, York City, Toronto Blizzard (again), Vancouver Whitecaps, UCD, Leeds United (again).

National team 
1969-1975 Scotland 21 caps & 4 goals

A Legend!
